title: Sampler, 1834
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: cross, buttonhole, and counted satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Alphabets, numerals, date and cross border of roses/leaves. Six samples of designs in counted satin surrounded by a leaf border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1834.
1834. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: cross, buttonhole, and counted satin stitches on plain weave. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-165.
